Name: Devil's Share
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Ginger, bourbon and lemon makes for a spicy and tasty little devil.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2006 by Pete Kendall at Match Bar, London, England.
